title: ASUS TUF Gaming F15
description: The excellent TUF Gaming F15 laptop, which is packed with innovative technologies, provides fantastic gaming performance and a wonderful user interface. The GeForce GTX 1650 GPU and 10th Gen Intel Core H-Series CPU on this laptop provides seamless gaming and faultless multitasking. Additionally, HDMI 2.0b, USB Type-C, and compatibility for multiple displays enable efficient multitasking. The superfast Intel Wi-Fi 6 with Gig+ (802.11ax) built into this laptop also allows you to comfortably game at LAN speeds wherever suitable connections are available. Moreover, this laptop's 7.1 channel surround sound system offers theater-quality acoustics so you can tune in and jam to your favourite tunes

title: Perfect Homes Waltz Engineered Wood King Box Bed
description: Model Number FK8019 Model Series Name Waltz Bed Size King Delivery Condition Knock Down Primary Color Brown Suitable For Bedroom, Kids Room Storage Included Yes With Mattress No Body And Design Details Bed Material Engineered Wood Bed Material Subtype Particle Board Headboard Material Engineered Wood Headboard Material Subtype Particle Board Upholstery Included No Finish Type Laminate Finish Color American Espresso Storage Type Box Headboard Type Open & Closed Storage Other Details Care Instructions DOs: (a) Use soft, dry towel for regular cleaning and dusting purposes. (b) Use coasters/mats/ tablecloths when placing hot objects or cold bottles that may leave a mark on the surface. (c) In case of any spills, soak the liquid first and then wipe the surface with a dry cloth. (d) For Cleaning the glass, use clean warm water or glass cleaner with a soft, lint-free cloth or a newspaper. (e) Before moving the furniture, always dismantle. DON'Ts: (a) Do not slide/drag/push the furniture. (b) Do not place the furniture under prolonged exposure to sunlight or near heat sources, like radiators, fireplaces, heaters or under damp conditions, like basement, attic or areas prone to leakage. (c) Do not clean Metal parts or Wooden panels with any Chemical or cleaning agent. (d) Do not use an acid, alkaline, Abrasive cleaner on the glass surface. (e) Avoid any unnatural loading, dropping heavy materials or using excessive force directly on the furniture. This may impact the structural integrity of the product.'
